statements: UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET behavior_type = 'login', prediction_result = 'positive' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET transaction_amount = 500.75, wallet_id = 98765 WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET transaction_amount = 500.00, behavior_type = 'Purchase' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET prediction_result = 'High Risk', wallet_id = 456 WHERE user_id = 789
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, transaction_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE transaction_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com', username='John Doe' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date='2022-02-15', amount=1500.75 WHERE transaction_id=456;
UPDATE users SET username = 'Alice', email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00, transaction_date = '2022-08-31' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE users SET username='new_username', email='new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE wallet_balance SET balance=1500.00, last_updated='2022-02-14 10:00:00' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE user_wallet_data SET amount = 500.00, transaction_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE user_id = 123 AND transaction_id = 456;
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET behavior_description = 'New behavior recorded', behavior_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 789 AND behavior_type = 'Login';
UPDATE user_wallet_data SET amount = amount + 500 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_trends SET transaction_category = 'Food' WHERE transaction_type = 'Expense';
UPDATE users SET username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE wallets SET balance=2000.50, last_updated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id=5;
